content: It'll take a little time to verify your ticket...

Don't worry, no matter the environment or Astralink,
It's all part of our path to connect the world's blocks,
And it's okay if you're not prepared at all.

Ho!
So you're still in school.
I hope your coursework isn't too heavy...

Hoho, it's quite a tough choice...
Then please allow me to make the decision for you.
I hope living in a familiar environment will help you feel more at ease.
Hoho, I'll have the other coordinators head to the destination and set up the camp first, and your luggage will be loaded up shortly.
A Bubble World with longer nights
A Bubble World like this has <color=#8AAB4B>longer days and shorter nights</color> in the summer, with plants thriving in the sunlight, flat landscapes, and denser meadows and forests.
Would you mind showing me your Link Ticket? I'll verify your relocation info for the Neo Astralink.

Register your personal information,
Your <color=#8AAB4B>name</color> and <color=#8AAB4B>birthday</color>,
To connect and begin your new life in Astralink.
It's just like the <color=#8AAB4B>Bubble World</color> I grew up in, where the days are longer, and sunshine fills most of the time...
I can't decide...

With our comprehensive Astralink services,
And alternative funding options,
So there's absolutely nothing to worry about...!!!

The Bubble World on this Astralink,
where you'll soon start your new life,
has a comfortable climate, but you'll need to adjust to the time difference.
Now, let's...

Now, we'll proceed with your Neo Astralink relocation registration.
Please use your phone to scan the QR code
and install the <color=#8AAB4B>Neo Astralink Connect Card</color>.
Ho! Just as I thought. A familiar environment does make things feel more at ease.
I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Mobai</color>, an Astralink coordinator from Loomi Co. I'll be here to assist you in your Neo Astralink life.

<size=30>This Link Ticket... hmm... alright...</size>
Ah, sorry for keeping you waiting.
Your ticket has been verified.
A Bubble World like this has <color=#8AAB4B>shorter days and longer nights</color> in the summer, with plants thriving in the shade, rugged landscapes, and more rivers and waterfalls.
Based on your preferred climate, I've found a perfect match for you—Astralink No. <color=#8AAB4B>{玩家航线代号}</color>!

I think this is an essential rhythm of life.
Ah, sorry,
By the way, I'd like to know about where you lived before...

No matter where,
each ecosystem has its unique vitality,
giving birth to various plants and terrains.
Similar to before.
A Bubble World with longer days
Greetings! Welcome to the <color=#8AAB4B><ruby:Bubble World Relocation Initiative>"Neo Astralink Wave"</ruby></color> Preparation Center!
It seems you've traveled from afar. What were you up to before deciding to start your Neo Astralink life?

This way there's time to wander and clear your mind,
Leave some space to focus on your own life,
And feel how time flows as seasons come and go.
So, for the place where you're about to begin your Neo Astralink life, would you prefer it to be similar to where you lived before, or are you up for somewhere completely new and different?
I just remembered, the place where I used to go to school was also a <color=#8AAB4B>Bubble World</color> with long nights, and it was quiet and cool most of the time~

The Bubble World on this Astralink,
where you'll soon start your new life,
has a comfortable climate, and there won't be any time difference issues.
Working
Studying

Oh, you're already working!
I hope daily life isn't too tough on you...

Is it a Bubble World with longer days,
Or one with longer nights?

This, I suppose... {短暂停}
is the way nature connects with us and time.
Try something new!

Hoho! I didn't expect that you have quite the adventurous spirit and curiosity.
Changing environments is also about changing one's state of mind.
Doing nothing

Hoho~ Same here.
Before deciding to join the Neo Astralink,
I spent quite a while just idling...

Connection Successful!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
welcome to Neo Astralink life!

Hohoho... my apologies!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
I'd like to officially invite you to join us on this journey.

The Astralink Camp is almost ready! 
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, there's only one car.
We're all packed so let's go, let's go!
